dsOverview.title: University of Wisconsin Antarctica Surface Observations, monthly 1980-1989

summary.p: This dataset contains summary of the month data for Antarctic surface stations for 1980 thru October, 1991. Some of the variables provided include minimum and maximum air temperature, mean temperature and air pressure, mean wind info and minimum and maximum air pressure. These data were obtained from the University of Wisconsin.

creator.name: UCAR/NCAR/CISL/DSS > Data Support Section, Computational and Information Systems Laboratory, National Center for Atmospheric Research, University Corporation for Atmospheric Research

contributor.name: UWI-MAD/AOS > Department of Atmospheric and Oceanic Sciences, University of Wisconsin, Madison
